title: Chelsea
description: When you see kids learn, there's that "light bulb" moment when they understand the material. It's really rewarding and makes all the preparation and planning worth it.

title: Anikeith
description: My favourite part of being an instructor was watching the kids create a program in Python all by themselves and show it off to other kids in the class.

title: Shehzad
description: My favorite part was seeing the kids take what I had taught them and help other kids in the class who were stuck. It showed me that they were getting it.
